name: Dice Attack (Pletipo)
description:
The Number on top of your dice is the damage you deal.

Defeat the three pawns of destruction and their minions!

Upgrade your dice on the field to deal better damage!

CONTROLS

- Can be played with Keyboard/Mouse and Gamepad ( PS4 )

  • MOVE : WASD /Left Stick
  • LOOK : Mouse/Right Stick
  • JUMP : Spacebar/ X Button
  • SHOOT : Mouse Left / Right Trigger
